channel.title: typescript on Yet another software engineer
channel.description: Recent content in typescript on Yet another software engineer

item.title: Educative.io course downloader
item.description: This script will download course for you from Educative.io. It uses NodeJS, TypeScript and your login credentials.

item.title: TypeScript with NodeJS. Type safety with better IntelliSense in NodeJS
item.description: End of the day everyone wants type safety in their code. Better type safety means less error in production. TypeScript provides type safety to JavaScript and it plays very well with Node.JS
